Tutorials.Item: This app uses cursor interaction. There is a pointer in the center of the screen. Move your device to make it hover on the object you wish to interact with. The cursor will turn yellow and become larger when it detects an interactable object. Then, tap anywhere on the screen to interact.

To the right of the figure are the data given by Bodylogical. There are 6 biometrics: body fat, BMI, HbA1C, LDL, blood pressure, and an overall score. The bars are separated into three sections, indicating health status. The indicators will be connected by ribbons across years to give you a clearer view of health development.
On the left of the control panel there will be 5 control buttons. Try each of them to see what they do!

Activities gives you a high-level view of the figure's health by simulating the figure's motion capabilities. You can see the character and his/her healthy friend working together. Use the slider bar and media buttons to see how they will behave in the future.
Internals simulate what happens inside the figure's organs. We will focus on three organs: heart, liver, and kidney. Click on the labels beside the organs to zoom in for closer inspection.
